text: Tove Berntsen (born 29 November 1951) is a Norwegian former long track speed skater, who was active in the late 1960s and 1970s. Berntsen represented her nation twice at the World Allround Speed Skating Championships for Women. In 1971, finishing 27th overall and in 1972, finishing 28th overall. She also competed at other international competitions. She became the Norwegian junior allround champion in 1969. Between 1970 and 1974 she competed a total of nine times at the Norwegian Allround Championships, winning the bronze medal at the allround championships in 1973 and 1974; and at the sprint champinships also in 1974. == Records== === Personal records === ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Norwegian female speed skaters Category:Living people
title: Tove Berntsen
